cards.flavor: "There is no justice when some profit and others go without."
cards.name: Alms Collector
cards.text:
Flash
If an opponent would draw two or more cards, instead you and that player each draw a card.

cards.flavor: "What weapon will you bear against one who's mastered them all?"
cards.name: Balan, Wandering Knight
cards.text:
First strike
Balan, Wandering Knight has double strike as long as two or more Equipment are attached to it.
{1}{W}: Attach all Equipment you control to Balan.

cards.flavor: Good health beckons many a vigorous follower.
cards.name: Curse of Vitality
cards.text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, you gain 2 life. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

cards.flavor: ". . . Is it over?"
cards.name: Fortunate Few
cards.text: Choose a nonland permanent you don't control, then each other player chooses a nonland permanent they don't control that hasn't been chosen this way. Destroy all other nonland permanents.

cards.name: Kindred Boon
cards.text:
As Kindred Boon enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
{1}{W}: Put a divinity counter on target creature you control of the chosen type.
Each creature you control with a divinity counter on it has indestructible.

cards.flavor: The justice of dragons demands more than just an eye for an eye.
cards.name: Scalelord Reckoner
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, destroy target nonland permanent that player controls.

cards.name: Stalking Leonin
cards.text:
When Stalking Leonin enters the battlefield, secretly choose an opponent.
Reveal the player you chose: Exile target creature that's attacking you if it's controlled by the chosen player. Activate this ability only once.

cards.name: Teferi's Protection
cards.text:
Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you have protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.)
Exile Teferi's Protection.

cards.flavor: Idle chatter beckons many an attentive ear.
cards.name: Curse of Verbosity
cards.text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, you draw a card. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

cards.flavor: Ground bones, broken glass, and splintered shipwrecks make up the sands of his shores.
cards.name: Galecaster Colossus
cards.text: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: Few things are truly "lost" at sea.
cards.name: Kindred Discovery
cards.text:
As Kindred Discovery enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Whenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card.

cards.flavor: "I'll show you what you truly desire."
cards.name: Magus of the Mind
cards.text: {U}, {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Mind: Shuffle your library, then exile the top X cards, where X is one plus the number of spells cast this turn. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

cards.name: Portal Mage
cards.text:
Flash
When Portal Mage enters the battlefield during the declare attackers step, you may reselect which player or planeswalker target attacking creature is attacking. (It can't attack its controller or its controller's planeswalkers.)

cards.flavor: "The veil of death hides little from our kind."
cards.name: Bloodline Necromancer
cards.text:
Lifelink
When Bloodline Necromancer enters the battlefield, you may return target Vampire or Wizard creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.flavor: Death arrives on tattered wings and stolen bones.
cards.name: Boneyard Scourge
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control dies while Boneyard Scourge is in your graveyard, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, return Boneyard Scourge from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.flavor: Sounds of life beckon many a restless soul.
cards.name: Curse of Disturbance
cards.text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

cards.name: Kheru Mind-Eater
cards.text:
Menace
Whenever Kheru Mind-Eater deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles a card from their hand face down.
You may look at and play cards exiled with Kheru Mind-Eater.

cards.flavor: In the end, the lights fade, the land withers, and only the dead and vile remain.
cards.name: Kindred Dominance
cards.text: Choose a creature type. Destroy all creatures that aren't of the chosen type.

cards.flavor:
"Now isn't that better?"
—Olivia Voldaren
cards.name: New Blood
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap an untapped Vampire you control.
Gain control of target creature. Change the text of that creature by replacing all instances of one creature type with Vampire.

cards.name: Patron of the Vein
cards.text:
Flying
When Patron of the Vein enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, exile it and put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

cards.flavor: Heart, mind, soul—weapons all.
cards.name: Vindictive Lich
cards.text:
When Vindictive Lich dies, choose one or more. Each mode must target a different player.
• Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
• Target opponent discards two cards.
• Target opponent loses 5 life.

cards.flavor: "My liege will lead and I will follow—to the battlefield, to the grave, and beyond."
cards.name: Bloodsworn Steward
cards.text:
Flying
Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have haste.

cards.flavor: The finest soldiers aren't worth a whit without a set of hands to lead them and a set of eyes to guide them.
cards.name: Crimson Honor Guard
cards.text:
Trample
At the beginning of each player's end step, Crimson Honor Guard deals 4 damage to that player unless they control a commander.

cards.flavor: Jingling coins beckon many an eager hand.
cards.name: Curse of Opulence
cards.text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a colorless artifact token named Gold. It has "Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color." Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

cards.flavor: Dinner and politics don't mix.
cards.name: Disrupt Decorum
cards.text: Goad all creatures you don't control. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)

cards.name: Izzet Chemister
cards.text:
Haste
{R}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.
{1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Izzet Chemister: Cast any number of cards exiled with Izzet Chemister without paying their mana costs.

cards.flavor: For goblins, quantity is quality.
cards.name: Kindred Charge
cards.text: Choose a creature type. For each creature you control of the chosen type, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Shifting Shadow
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has haste and "At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy this creature. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and attach Shifting Shadow to it, then put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in a random order."

cards.name: Territorial Hellkite
cards.text:
Flying, haste
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose an opponent at random that Territorial Hellkite didn't attack during your last combat. Territorial Hellkite attacks that player this combat if able. If you can't choose an opponent this way, tap Territorial Hellkite.

cards.flavor: Flavorful aromas beckon many a salivating maw.
cards.name: Curse of Bounty
cards.text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, untap all nonland permanents you control. Each opponent attacking that player untaps all nonland permanents they control.

cards.name: Hungry Lynx
cards.text:
Cats you control have protection from Rats. (They can't be blocked, targeted, or dealt damage by Rats.)
At the beginning of your end step, target opponent creates a 1/1 black Rat creature token with deathtouch.
Whenever a Rat dies, put a +1/+1 counter on each Cat you control.

cards.name: Kindred Summons
cards.text: Choose a creature type. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal X creature cards of the chosen type, where X is the number of creatures you control of that type. Put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.

cards.flavor: All things will crumble, whether by time or by force.
cards.name: Qasali Slingers
cards.text:
Reach
Whenever Qasali Slingers or another Cat enters the battlefield under your control, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor: With such great footsteps, everything is within walking distance.
cards.name: Traverse the Outlands
cards.text: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control. Put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Arahbo, Roar of the World
cards.text:
Eminence — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if Arahbo, Roar of the World is in the command zone or on the battlefield, another target Cat you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Whenever another Cat you control attacks, you may pay {1}{G}{W}. If you do, it gains trample and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

cards.name: Edgar Markov
cards.text:
Eminence — Whenever you cast another Vampire spell, if Edgar Markov is in the command zone or on the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Vampire creature token.
First strike, haste
Whenever Edgar Markov attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

cards.flavor: Self-reflection is not without its perils.
cards.name: Fractured Identity
cards.text: Exile target nonland permanent. Each player other than its controller creates a token that's a copy of it.

cards.name: Inalla, Archmage Ritualist
cards.text:
Eminence — Whenever another nontoken Wizard enters the battlefield under your control, if Inalla, Archmage Ritualist is in the command zone or on the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that Wizard. The token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
Tap five untapped Wizards you control: Target player loses 7 life.

cards.flavor: "Loss has no meaning here. You cannot take from those who have nothing."
cards.name: Kess, Dissident Mage
cards.text:
Flying
During each of your turns, you may cast an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. If a card cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

cards.flavor: "I give my blood, my life, all I have in exchange for victory."
cards.name: Licia, Sanguine Tribune
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each 1 life you gained this turn.
First strike, lifelink
Pay 5 life: Put three +1/+1 counters on Licia, Sanguine Tribune. Activate this ability only during your turn and only once each turn.

cards.name: Mairsil, the Pretender
cards.text:
When Mairsil, the Pretender enters the battlefield, you may exile an artifact or creature card from your hand or graveyard and put a cage counter on it.
Mairsil, the Pretender has all activated abilities of all cards you own in exile with cage counters on them. You may activate each of those abilities only once each turn.

cards.flavor: "All will know of your crimes."
cards.name: Mathas, Fiend Seeker
cards.text:
Menace
At the beginning of your end step, put a bounty counter on target creature an opponent controls. For as long as that creature has a bounty counter on it, it has "When this creature dies, each opponent draws a card and gains 2 life."

cards.name: Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist
cards.text:
First strike
Whenever Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist attacks, each opponent can't block with more than one creature this combat.
As long as Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist is tapped, no more than one creature can attack you each combat.

cards.name: Nazahn, Revered Bladesmith
cards.text:
When Nazahn, Revered Bladesmith enters the battlefield, search your library for an Equipment card and reveal it. If you reveal a card named Hammer of Nazahn this way, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Whenever an equipped creature you control attacks, you may tap target creature defending player controls.

cards.flavor: At his behest the Kami War began to regain That Which Was Taken.
cards.name: O-Kagachi, Vengeful Kami
cards.text:
Flying, trample
Whenever O-Kagachi, Vengeful Kami deals combat damage to a player, if that player attacked you during their last turn, exile target nonland permanent that player controls.

cards.name: Taigam, Ojutai Master
cards.text:
Instant, sorcery, and Dragon spells you control can't be countered.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand, if Taigam, Ojutai Master attacked this turn, that spell gains rebound. (Exile the spell as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Taigam, Sidisi's Hand
cards.text:
Skip your draw step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
{B}, {T}, Exile X cards from your graveyard: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

cards.name: The Ur-Dragon
cards.text:
Eminence — As long as The Ur-Dragon is in the command zone or on the battlefield, other Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Flying
Whenever one or more Dragons you control attack, draw that many cards, then you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor: Once a fierce foe, she would become one of Madara's greatest protectors.
cards.name: Wasitora, Nekoru Queen
cards.text:
Flying, trample
Whenever Wasitora, Nekoru Queen deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a creature. If the player can't, you create a 3/3 black, red, and green Cat Dragon creature token with flying.

cards.flavor: Spilled blood always begets more of the same.
cards.name: Bloodforged Battle-Axe
Hammer of Nazahn
Heirloom Blade
Herald's Horn
cards.text:
As Herald's Horn enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creature spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.
At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card of the chosen type, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.

cards.name: Mirror of the Forebears
cards.text:
As Mirror of the Forebears enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
{1}: Until end of turn, Mirror of the Forebears becomes a copy of target creature you control of the chosen type, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

cards.name: Ramos, Dragon Engine
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Ramos, Dragon Engine for each of that spell's colors.
Remove five +1/+1 counters from Ramos: Add {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}. Activate this ability only once each turn.

cards.name: Path of Ancestry
cards.text:
Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1.

cards.flavor: "By the time your knees have worn through your robe, you may have begun to learn your place."
cards.name: Blind Obedience
cards.text:
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

cards.flavor:
"No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now."
—Alovnek, Boros guildmage
cards.name: Condemn
cards.text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

cards.flavor: Survival of the purest.
cards.name: Divine Reckoning
cards.text:
Each player chooses a creature they control. Destroy the rest.
Flashback {5}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor:
"They had it coming."
—Squire Imalia, savior of Thiswick
cards.name: Fell the Mighty
cards.text: Destroy all creatures with power greater than target creature's power.

cards.flavor: Light's champion in the stronghold of darkness.
cards.name: Jareth, Leonine Titan
cards.text:
Whenever Jareth, Leonine Titan blocks, it gets +7/+7 until end of turn.
{W}: Jareth gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"As my kha, he is the source of my inspiration. As my brother, he is the embodiment of my aspirations."
—Ajani Goldmane
cards.name: Jazal Goldmane
cards.text:
First strike
{3}{W}{W}: Attacking creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

cards.flavor: "I am not Raksha. I never will be. But I refuse to be the kha who watched her pride be torn asunder."
cards.name: Kemba, Kha Regent
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 white Cat creature token for each Equipment attached to Kemba, Kha Regent.

cards.flavor: "Our people are torn by infighting. Until the two sides reconcile, our laws can carry no meaning."
cards.name: Leonin Arbiter
cards.text: Players can't search libraries. Any player may pay {2} for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.

cards.name: Leonin Relic-Warder
cards.text:
When Leonin Relic-Warder enters the battlefield, you may exile target artifact or enchantment.
When Leonin Relic-Warder leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

cards.flavor: Her instinct is as sharp as her blade.
cards.name: Leonin Shikari
cards.text: You may activate equip abilities any time you could cast an instant.

cards.name: Orator of Ojutai
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Defender, flying
When Orator of Ojutai enters the battlefield, if you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, draw a card.

cards.name: Oreskos Explorer
cards.text: When Oreskos Explorer enters the battlefield, search your library for up to X Plains cards, where X is the number of players who control more lands than you. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: Some believe that Raksha, youngest of the kha, is the reincarnation of Dakan, the first and mightiest of leonin leaders.
cards.name: Raksha Golden Cub
cards.text:
Vigilance
As long as Raksha Golden Cub is equipped, Cat creatures you control get +2/+2 and have double strike.

cards.flavor: Some timelines forever fray, branch, and intermingle. Others end abruptly.
cards.name: Return to Dust
cards.text: Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor:
"End this. What I seek is far greater."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
cards.name: Rout
cards.text:
You may cast Rout as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Seht's Tiger
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Seht's Tiger enters the battlefield, you gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything of the chosen color.)

cards.flavor: Thieves know that a snarl in the night means, "Rob another house."
cards.name: Spirit of the Hearth
cards.text:
Flying
You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

cards.flavor:
"We trust in the scalelords, bringers of justice that none can escape."
—Urdnan, Dromoka warrior
cards.name: Sunscorch Regent
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Sunscorch Regent and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: Left without their leader Raksha, the leonin split into two prides: one side supported the regent kha, while the other rebelled in fury.
cards.name: Sunspear Shikari
cards.text: As long as Sunspear Shikari is equipped, it has first strike and lifelink.

cards.flavor: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.
cards.name: Swords to Plowshares
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

cards.name: Taj-Nar Swordsmith
cards.text: When Taj-Nar Swordsmith enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. If you do, search your library for an Equipment card with converted mana cost X or less and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: After the Battle of Liet Field, the white sun crested above Taj-Nar, bringing hope to all who survived the carnage.
cards.name: White Sun's Zenith
cards.text: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens. Shuffle White Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

cards.name: Wing Shards
cards.text:
Target player sacrifices an attacking creature.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

cards.flavor: He has journeyed where none have been before. Now he returns to ensure that none follow.
cards.name: Arcanis the Omnipotent
cards.text:
{T}: Draw three cards.
{2}{U}{U}: Return Arcanis the Omnipotent to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: "Words of power never disappear. They sleep, awaiting those with the will to rouse them."
cards.name: Archaeomancer
cards.text: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
"Choices belong to those with the luxuries of time and distance. We have neither. I recommend we proceed with the plan to destroy all shrines of the kami."
—Lady Azami, letter to Sensei Hisoka
cards.name: Azami, Lady of Scrolls
cards.text: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Draw a card.

cards.flavor: "I am who I pretend to be."
cards.name: Body Double
cards.text: You may have Body Double enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature card in a graveyard.

cards.flavor: Their lust for battle was so great that they didn't care their enemies wore their own faces.
cards.name: Clone Legion
cards.text: For each creature target player controls, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

cards.name: Harbinger of the Tides
cards.text:
You may cast Harbinger of the Tides as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)
When Harbinger of the Tides enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: "Roil tide! Roil tide! Tie yourselves down!"
cards.name: Into the Roil
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

cards.flavor: To scrape out a living in Aphetto, wizards are reduced to selling rumors, lies, forgeries, or—if they get desperate enough—the truth.
cards.name: Merchant of Secrets
cards.text: When Merchant of Secrets enters the battlefield, draw a card.

cards.name: Monastery Siege
cards.text:
As Monastery Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card, then discard a card.
• Dragons — Spells your opponents cast that target you or a permanent you control cost {2} more to cast.

cards.flavor: "Opportunity isn't something you wait for. It's something you create."
cards.name: Opportunity
cards.text: Target player draws four cards.

cards.flavor:
"The flies were bothering me."
—Jalira, master polymorphist
cards.name: Polymorphist's Jest
cards.text: Until end of turn, each creature target player controls loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.

cards.name: Reality Shift
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of their library. (That player puts the top card of their library onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. If it's a creature card, it can be turned face up any time for its mana cost.)

cards.flavor: "The secret entrance should be near."
cards.name: Sea Gate Oracle
cards.text: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

cards.flavor: "Even a dragon is humble as a kitten if it thinks itself a slave."
cards.name: Serendib Sorcerer
cards.text: {T}: Target creature other than Serendib Sorcerer has base power and toughness 0/2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Spelltwine
cards.text: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard and target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard. Copy those cards. Cast the copies if able without paying their mana costs. Exile Spelltwine.

cards.flavor:
"Conquering your first world is the hardest, after all. My power grew as I moved from world to world, taking anything that would make the next taking easier."
—Ob Nixilis
cards.name: Ambition's Cost
cards.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

cards.flavor: "So many have died in search of that map. And now it appears in the hands of the arrogant child Chandra Nalaar."
cards.name: Anowon, the Ruin Sage
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player sacrifices a non-Vampire creature.

cards.flavor: A mage willing to dedicate his life to his craft.
cards.name: Apprentice Necromancer
cards.text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Apprentice Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it.

cards.name: Black Market
cards.text:
Whenever a creature dies, put a charge counter on Black Market.
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {B} for each charge counter on Black Market.

cards.flavor: "Great art can never be created without great suffering."
cards.name: Blood Artist
cards.text: Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.name: Blood Tribute
cards.text:
Kicker—Tap an untapped Vampire you control. (You may tap a Vampire you control in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Target opponent loses half their life, rounded up. If this spell was kicked, you gain life equal to the life lost this way.

cards.name: Bloodhusk Ritualist
cards.text:
Multikicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
When Bloodhusk Ritualist enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card for each time it was kicked.

cards.name: Bloodlord of Vaasgoth
cards.text:
Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.)
Flying
Whenever you cast a Vampire creature spell, it gains bloodthirst 3.

cards.flavor: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.
cards.name: Butcher of Malakir
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

cards.name: Captivating Vampire
cards.text:
Other Vampire creatures you control get +1/+1.
Tap five untapped Vampires you control: Gain control of target creature. It becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types.

cards.name: Consuming Vapors
cards.text:
Target player sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.flavor: Even when the flesh grows cold, knowledge waits in the bones for a master to release it.
cards.name: Corpse Augur
cards.text: When Corpse Augur dies, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of creature cards in target player's graveyard.

cards.flavor: Ugin's whispered summons led Sarkhan Vol to the moment that would echo down the centuries and seal Tarkir's fate: the primal battle between Ugin and Nicol Bolas.
cards.name: Crux of Fate
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all Dragon creatures.
• Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.

cards.flavor:
"Silumgar's mind is a dark labyrinth, full of grim secrets and subtle traps."
—Siara, the Dragon's Mouth
cards.name: Damnable Pact
cards.text: Target player draws X cards and loses X life.

cards.flavor: "Ah, this is a nice life. I can see why you were so desperate to keep it."
cards.name: Dark Impostor
